definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: brother (Ph. [[אח]], Ar. 0’ax (cstr. 0’axuw etc.), Sab. [[אחַ]] (sf. [[אחַיהו]] ) CIS:iv. 1, 17 and 24 al., Eth. 0xw: As. aḫu cf. Dl:W, Aram. [[אַח]], 0ah.o0; Palm., Nab. sf. [[אחוהי]], [[אחיה]]);—abs. [[אָח]] Ge 24:29 + (Ez Eze 18:10 del. Co cf. LXX SyrVer Vulgate; Ew Sm [[אַח]]; Dl Ba:Ez x defends as = one cf. As. aḫu) never c. art.; cstr [[אֲחִי]] Ge 10:21 +; sf. [[אָחִי]] Ge 4:9 +; [[אָחִיךָ]] Ge 4:9 +; [[אָחִיו]] Ge 4:2 +; [[אָחִיהוּ]] Je 34:9 + 3 t. etc.; pl. [[אַחִים]] Ge 13:8 +; so rd. Ho 13:15 v. De:Compl. Var. 23 cf. sub [[אָחוּ]]; cstr. [[אֲחֵי]] Nu 27:10 +; sf. [[אַחַי]] Ge 19:7 +; [[אֶחָָי]] 1Sa 20:29 + (but 1Sa 30:23 LXX We [[אַחֲרֵי]] for [[אֶחָָי את]]); [[אַחֶיךָ]] Ge 37:13 +; [[אֶחָיו]] Ge 44:14 + etc.

brother, born of same mother (& father) Ge 4:2, Ge 4:8, Ge 4:9, Ge 4:10, Ge 4:11, Ge 27:6, Ge 27:11, Ge 44:20, Ge 49:5; cf. Ge 28:2, Ge 29:10, Ge 29:10 + Ex 4:14 + oft.; also of half-brother Ge 20:5, Ge 20:13, Ge 20:16 (on pa-rentage cf. v:Ge 20:12) Ge 37:2, Ge 37:4, Ge 37:5 +, 2Sa 13:4, 2Sa 13:7, 2Sa 13:8 +.

indef. = relative; Lot, of Abr. Ge 13:8, Ge 14:12, Ge 14:14, Ge 14:16; Jacob, of Laban Ge 29:12, Ge 29:15 (nephew); hence of kinship in wider sense; member of same tribe Nu 16:10, Nu 18:2, Nu 18:6, 2Sa 19:13; of same people Ex 2:11, Ex 2:11, Ex 4:18, De 15:12, Ju Jdg 14:3, Is 66:20, Ne 5:1, Ne 5:5, Ne 5:8 vid. esp. Le 19:17 cf. v:Le 19:18 (ex-tended to incl. sojourner [[גֵּר]] v:Le 19:34); of Israel & Judah 2Sa 19:42; Isr. & Edom Nu 20:14; cf. of Ishmael Ge 16:12, Ge 25:18; of friend 2Sa 1:26, 1Ki 9:13, 1Ki 20:32, 1Ki 20:33 of allies ´[[בְּרִית א]] Am 1:9.
fig. of resemblance Job 30:29 [[אָח הָיִיתִי לְתַנִּים]] (‖[[רֵעַ לִבְנוֹת]] [[יַעֲנׇה]] i.e. by reason of his crying, cf. Di; Pr 18:9 [[מִתְרַפֶּה בִּמְלַאכְתּוֹ אָח הוּא לְבַעַל מַשְׁחִית]].

in phr. one…another [[אִישׁ אָחִיו]] Ge 9:5, Joe 2:8, Zc Zec 7:10; [[אָחִיו]]…[[אִישׁ ]]Ge 13:11 + 25 t + Ex 32:27 (where also same phr. c. [[רֵעֵהוּ]] & [[קְרׂבוֹ]]—v. these words—& also [[אִישׁ]], [[אֶחָד]]; for development of idiom cf. De 15:2, Is 19:2, Je 34:14, (cf.Je 34:15), Je 34:17, Ez Eze 38:21, Hag 2:22; usually of men; of faces of golden cherubim Ex 25:20, Ex 37:9; of scales of crocodile Job 41:9. ([[אָח]] fire-pot. v. sub II. [[אחח]].)
